pages.title: Rotor Bearing
pages.text: The Rotor Bearing is the base of your Turbine $(l:bigreactors:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l) assembly.$(br2)It must be placed in one of the Turbine faces, usually in the center, and followed by some $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-rotorshaft)Rotor Shaft$(/l) blocks.
$(l)Mandatory:$() one, and only one, is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
